content: this adult sized crochet pullover sweater is simple and easy to make it s warm and comfortable for chilly weather laying on vacation or over a tank and jeans for a simple handmade wardrobe pattern includes sizes xs-3xl women s this is an intermediate level crochet pattern and the techniques you will need to know are single_crochet increases and decreases stitching in the back loop only chain stitch seaming and slip_stitch
